name: Red Space (dajaca25)
description:
(Info):

"Red Space" was created as part of Drexel University's Digital Storytelling class in 2018.  

(Controls):

Left Shift/R1/X Button- Strafe

Spacebar/Circle Button- Shoot

WASD/Arrow keys- Movement

(Credits):

Character models and animations by Ian Morales

Level 1, "Workers Halls," "Neo Red Square," elevator, and "Stalin's Room" modeled by Andrew Fairfull

Level 2, "Sewers", Level 3 "2001 Halls", and "Galaxy Star SSR" modeled by Jackson Rygiel

Game direction and scripting by Dan Caldwell

Stalin's voice by Mike Toone

Damien's voice by Dan Caldwell

Machine Man's voice by Ian Morales

Written by Dan Caldwell and Ian Morales
